response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item holds significant value to us at $10,000, but considering its potential impact on your endeavors, we believe it's worth every penny. To make this opportunity more accessible and beneficial for both parties, we propose an offer of $9,500. This price not only reflects the product's true worth but also provides you with a considerable advantage over market prices. We're confident it will meet and exceed your expectations, contributing positively to your projects or personal needs. Please let us know if you're interested in discussing further details or proceeding with the purchase.", "product_price": 9500}
